languages.text: {n}Комиссар с удивительными спокойствием и деловитостью поправляет фуражку.{/n} "Зря. Могли бы стать союзниками".
{n}The Commissar fixes his cap with surprising composure and purposefulness.{/n} "That's a shame. We could have become allies."
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар с удивительными спокойствием и деловитостью поправляет фуражку.{/n} "Зря. Могли бы стать союзниками".

languages.text: {n}政委以极其镇定的态度正了正帽子。{/n}“这可真是太可惜了，我们本可以成为盟友的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar fixes his cap with surprising composure and purposefulness.{/n} "That's a shame. We could have become allies."

traits.locale_text: {n}政委以极其镇定的态度正了正帽子。{/n}“这可真是太可惜了，我们本可以成为盟友的。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは驚くほど冷静に、明確な意志を持つかのようにして帽子を直した。{/n}「残念です。良き仲間になれると思ったのですがね」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar fixes his cap with surprising composure and purposefulness.{/n} "That's a shame. We could have become allies."

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは驚くほど冷静に、明確な意志を持つかのようにして帽子を直した。{/n}「残念です。良き仲間になれると思ったのですがね」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}El Comisario se coloca el sombrero con una compostura y resolución sorprendentes.{/n} «Lástima. Podríamos haber sido aliados».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar fixes his cap with surprising composure and purposefulness.{/n} "That's a shame. We could have become allies."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Comisario se coloca el sombrero con una compostura y resolución sorprendentes.{/n} «Lástima. Podríamos haber sido aliados».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar fixes his cap with surprising composure and purposefulness.{/n} "That's a shame. We could have become allies."

languages.text: {n}Avec un calme étonnant compte tenu des circonstances, le commissaire ajuste sa casquette.{/n} « Quel dommage. Nous aurions pu être alliés. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar fixes his cap with surprising composure and purposefulness.{/n} "That's a shame. We could have become allies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un calme étonnant compte tenu des circonstances, le commissaire ajuste sa casquette.{/n} « Quel dommage. Nous aurions pu être alliés. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar zieht mit überraschend viel Haltung und Entschlossenheit seine Mütze gerade.{/n} "Das ist schade. Wir hätten Verbündete werden können."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar fixes his cap with surprising composure and purposefulness.{/n} "That's a shame. We could have become allies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar zieht mit überraschend viel Haltung und Entschlossenheit seine Mütze gerade.{/n} "Das ist schade. Wir hätten Verbündete werden können."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser, şaşırtıcı bir soğukkanlılık ve kararlılıkla şapkasını düzeltiyor.{/n} "Yazık oldu. Müttefik olabilirdik."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar fixes his cap with surprising composure and purposefulness.{/n} "That's a shame. We could have become allies."
